author: Saumya Agrawal
title: Funny Board exam memes for students: Last-minute padhai to seating plan woes | Viral News - News9live
text: New Delhi: Class 10 and 12 final exams of the the Central Board of Secondary Education (CBSE) began on Thursday, February 15. As students study for their Board exams, here are some funny memes to relieve them of the stressful world of academics. From making fun about legends studying at last-minute to worrying about getting the front row seat in the exam hall, students will find these funny memes relatable. Board exam memes Share these hilarious Board exam memes with your friends and encourage them to take breaks while studying. Exam memes funny Students before and after exams: Last-minute padhai be like: Memes on exam Hours before exams: Students in exam hall: Exam memes funny for students Student life phases: Ever found yourself asking, "Kal exam hai? Kal konsa paper hai?" Exam memes video Making notes for exams: Watching Lecture At 3x Before Exam !! . . .#MLearningIndia #Learning #meme #examtime #exam #viralvideo #explore #foryou #fyp #foryoupage #explorepage #exploremore #explore pic.twitter.com\/TW46ccWJO0 — M Learning India (@MLearning_India) February 10, 2024 How's the exam preparation going on? #exam #upsc #study #exams #education #gk #india #ssc #student #memes #currentaffairs #ias آپ کے آخری امتحان پر گڈ لک کوئی سوال نہیں ہمارا pic.twitter.com\/tuBAgcFqO7 — UZMA MAQSOOD (@uzmamaqsood28) February 14, 2024 Forgot admit card? Board exam meme pic.twitter.com\/FQKcDhpdk8 — Sachya (@sachya2002) February 20, 2023 Exam meme funny Reaction after invigilator distributes question papers: When your friends discuss the answers they wrote in exam: Board exam memes 2024 Worried about getting front row seat in exam hall? When invigilators catch students cheating: Board exam funny meme Feeling like Sid from Wake Up Sid? Good luck to all the students!
